mapper.insert: INSERT INTO enrollments ( student_id, course_id, status, enrolled_at, progress, last_access_at, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{studentId}, #{courseId}, #{status}, #{enrolledAt}, 0.0, NOW(), NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM enrollments WHERE student_id = #{studentId} AND course_id = #{courseId}
mapper.update: UPDATE enrollments SET status = #{status}, progress = #{progress}, grade = #{grade}, completed_at = #{completedAt}, last_access_at = #{lastAccessAt}, notes = #{notes}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT e.*, u.display_name as student_name, c.title as course_name, t.display_name as teacher_name FROM enrollments e LEFT JOIN users u ON e.student_id = u.id LEFT JOIN courses c ON e.course_id = c.id LEFT JOIN users t ON c.teacher_id = t.id WHERE e.id = #{id}

SELECT e.*, u.display_name as student_name, c.title as course_name, t.display_name as teacher_name FROM enrollments e LEFT JOIN users u ON e.student_id = u.id LEFT JOIN courses c ON e.course_id = c.id LEFT JOIN users t ON c.teacher_id = t.id WHERE e.student_id = #{studentId} AND e.course_id = #{courseId}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM enrollments WHERE student_id = #{studentId} AND course_id = #{courseId}
